item.title: 杰富瑞看好印度快速增长的共同基金市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is gearing up to enter India’s $900 billion asset-management industry, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a growing list of global financial giants seeking to tap one of the world’s fastest-growing major economies.】

item.title: 产量激增，全球海上石油产量再创新高
item.description: 随着全球主要产油国的产量不断增加，油轮上驶向世界各大洋的石油数量再次跃升。【原文：The amount of oil sailing the world’s oceans on tankers jumped again as production from key producers is ramping up around the globe.】

item.title: 精品投资银行押注巴西债务咨询业务
item.description: 里卡多-拉塞尔达（Ricardo Lacerda）表示，由于巴西约有 25% 的大型公司在高杠杆率下挣扎，他正在扩大其精品投资银行的债务重组咨询服务。【原文：With about 25% of large Brazilian companies struggling with high leverage, Ricardo Lacerda says he’s expanding his boutique investment bank’s debt-restructuring advisory services.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班主张降低中央银行利率
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克多-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）表示，他更倾向于降低利率，这是他在货币政策上的一次权衡，因为他正试图及时启动经济，以迎接明年不成功便成仁的大选。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban said he’d prefer lower interest rates, weighing in on monetary policy as he seeks to kickstart the economy in time for a make-or-break election next year.】

item.title: 石油过剩迹象日益明显，欧佩克+分歧再现
item.description:
原油在该集团周日同意仅恢复部分停产后上涨。【原文：

Crude rose after the group agreed on Sunday to revive just a sliver of halted output.

】

item.title: 苹果公司因 Siri 录制语音在法国面临调查
item.description: 苹果公司因使用其助手 Siri 录制的语音在法国面临调查。【原文：Apple Inc. faces an investigation in France over the use of voice recordings made with its assistant Siri.】

item.title: 日本和法国的政治意外令投资者措手不及
item.description:
这些事态发展在金融市场掀起了轩然大波。它们的共同点是令人惊讶。【原文：

The developments are sending shockwaves through financial markets. One element they share is surprise.

】

item.title: 大额债务交易为人工智能热潮推波助澜
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃德-鲁德洛（Ed Ludlow）将报道助推人工智能热潮的融资情况。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow reports on the financing that is helping fuel the AI boom.】

item.title: 德国拨款 60 亿欧元帮助清理重工业
item.description: 德国明年将拨出 60 亿欧元（70 亿美元）用于帮助其重工业减少碳排放，从而结束了旨在帮助企业转向清洁技术的补贴的不确定性。【原文：Germany earmarked €6 billion ($7 billion) for next year to help reduce carbon emissions of its heavy industries, ending uncertainty over subsidies that are meant to help companies shift to cleaner technologies.】

item.title: 美国的韧性可能建立在财富效应的风险基础之上
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们将探讨美国经济恢复力的潜在原因。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the potential reason for US economic resilience. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 中国抓住特朗普的软肋向美国提供投资
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的第二个任期内，首席执行官们很快了解到，有一种简单的方法可以获得他的青睐。在椭圆形办公室的摄像头前承诺在美国投资数十亿美元，再加上阿谀奉承，很有可能至少会得到一些你想要的东西。【原文：CEOs have learned quickly in President Donald Trump’s second term that there’s an easy way to get in his good graces. Pledge to invest billions in the US before the Oval Office cameras, add flattery, and chances are good you will get at least some of what you seek.】

item.title: EQT 投资法律初创企业 Harvey，推动国际增长
item.description: 法律服务平台 Harvey 获得了 EQT AB 基金 5000 万欧元（5900 万美元）的战略投资，以支持公司的国际扩张。【原文：Legal services platform Harvey has raised €50 million ($59 million) in a strategic investment from an EQT AB fund to support the company’s international expansion.】

item.title: 特朗普打击海上风电令分包商前景黯淡
item.description: 特朗普政府对海上风电产业的打击正在挤压帮助建造风电场的分包商的主要收入来源，迫使许多分包商将投资计划搁置。【原文：The Trump administration’s attack on the offshore wind industry is squeezing a key revenue stream for the subcontractors that help build wind farms, forcing many to put investment plans on ice.】

item.title: 智利电信公司债券在沉寂数月后受消息冲击
item.description: 上月底，由于担心智利电信公司（Telefonica Moviles Chile SA）即将被拆分出售，该公司的债券大幅下挫，但当一个潜在竞标背后的名字被披露为拉丁美洲最大的两家电信公司时，该债券又出现反弹。【原文：Bonds in Telefonica Moviles Chile SA nosedived at the end of last month on fears the company was about to be broken up and sold, then rebounded when it was revealed that the names behind one potential bid are two of Latin America’s largest telecom firms.】

item.title: 礼来公司将投资 10 亿美元用于印度合同生产
item.description: 礼来公司计划未来几年在印度投资超过 10 亿美元，在这个南亚国家建立新的合同制造能力，这凸显了这家美国制药商对全球供应网络的推动。【原文：Eli Lilly and Co. plans to invest more than $1 billion in India over the next few years to build new contract manufacturing capabilities in the South Asian nation, underscoring the US drugmaker’s push to bolster its global supply network.】

item.title: OpenAI 与 AMD 签订价值数百亿美元的芯片协议
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.AMD 的股价飙升。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. inked a deal with OpenAI to roll out AI infrastructure in a pact the chipmaker said could generate tens of billions of dollars in new revenue. AMD’s shares soared.】

item.title: 特朗普的矛盾之处：要求为 "蓬勃发展 "的经济大幅降息
item.description: 当最近的数据显示美国经济以近两年来最快的速度增长时，白宫发表声明称赞 "特朗普经济的爆炸性增长"，证明 "所谓的'专家'"错了。【原文：When recent data showed the US economy grew by the fastest pace in nearly two years, the White House released a statement hailing the “Trump economy’s explosive growth,” which proved “so called ‘experts’” wrong.】

item.title: 印度调查受污染止咳糖浆与至少 14 人死亡有关
item.description: 在十多名儿童服用止咳糖浆死亡后，印度当局开始对一家止咳糖浆生产商进行刑事调查，再次引发了药品生产控制标准不完善的问题。【原文：Indian authorities started a criminal investigation into a cough syrup maker following the death of more than a dozen children who consumed the product, reigniting the issue of poor control standards in the manufacturing of the medicine.】

item.title: 葡萄牙央行行长佩雷拉称葡萄牙债务仍然过高
item.description: 葡萄牙新任央行行长阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）表示，葡萄牙是欧元区近年来在减少公共负债方面表现突出的国家之一，但仍然面临着过重的负担，必须更加努力地减轻负担。【原文：Portugal, one of the euro area’s standout performers in reducing public liabilities in recent years, still faces an excessive burden and must work harder to reduce it, according to new central bank governor Alvaro Santos Pereira.】

item.title: 沙特借款狂潮加速，PIF 首次发行欧元绿色债券
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金委托银行进行其首次以欧元计价的绿色债券销售，这表明近期旨在为沙特王国经济转型计划提供资金的借贷活动浪潮并未停止。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund mandated banks for its first euro-denominated green bond sale, signaling no let up in the recent wave of borrowing activity aimed at financing the kingdom’s economic transformation plans.】

item.title: 停摆威胁数十亿美元交易，IPO陷入困境
item.description: 如果美国政府持续停摆，导致价值数十亿美元的交易被搁置，那么人们期待已久的首次公开募股（IPO）复苏就会放缓。【原文：The long-awaited IPO revival is poised to slow if the ongoing US government shutdown lingers, putting billions of dollars worth of deals on hold.】

item.title: Blackstone、阿布扎比 Lunate 携手打造 50 亿美元物流平台
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正与阿布扎比的 Lunate 合作建立一个新平台，目标是在更广泛的地区进行价值 50 亿美元的投资，因为这家美国私募股权投资巨头希望建立其物流资产投资组合。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is partnering with Abu Dhabi’s Lunate on a new platform that will target investments worth $5 billion across the wider region, as the US private equity giant looks to build on its portfolio of logistics assets.】

item.title: 希腊预测 2025 年债务比率将达到救助前最低水平
item.description: 据估计，希腊目前的借款总额已降至 2009 年以来的最低点，当时的金融动荡迫使希腊寻求长达十年之久的危机中的首次救助。【原文：Greece’s pile of borrowings are now estimated to have fallen to the lowest since 2009, before financial turmoil then forced the country to seek the first bailout of its decade-long crisis.】

item.title: TikTok 许可证纠纷凸显 ByteDance 在印尼面临的挑战
item.description: TikTok 上周末与印尼政府共享了印尼用户的大量数据，交出了大量潜在的敏感信息，以避免在其最大的东南亚市场被吊销执照。【原文：TikTok shared a trove of data about Indonesian users with the country’s government over the weekend, handing over reams of potentially sensitive information to avert a license suspension in its biggest Southeast Asian market.】

item.title: 高盛的科斯汀称，S&P 500 强企业将打破低盈利标准
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US companies are set to enjoy a better-than-expected earnings season as a robust economy and a solid outlook for artificial intelligence have left estimates looking too low, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将对外国股票投资者征收三倍的资本收益税
item.description: 尼日利亚将对外国股票投资者征收三倍的资本利得税，这引发了人们的担忧，担心此举可能会引发这个西非国家股市的抛售，而这个国家的股市今年已经上涨了近 40%。【原文：Nigeria is tripling capital gains tax for foreign equity investors, raising concerns that the move may trigger a sell-off in the West African nation’s stock market, which is up almost 40% this year.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织官员称合成风险转移市场信息披露漏洞百出
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）官员小组发布的一份文件指出，监管机构需要加强对银行使用合成风险转移的监督，因为合成风险转移可能会使金融体系变得更加脆弱。【原文：Regulators need to step up the oversight of banks’ use of synthetic risk transfers which may make the financial system more fragile, according to a paper released by a group of International Monetary Fund officials.】

item.title: 巴克莱股票指标阻止 9 月反弹，暗示将有更多涨幅
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的一项股票指标正确预测了 9 月份的涨势，并对季节性疲软表示担忧，据此判断，美国股市的多月连涨势头有望延续。【原文：A multi-month winning streak in US stocks is poised to continue based on an equity indicator from Barclays Plc that correctly predicted September’s rally in the face of concern over seasonal weakness.】

item.title: 苏尼尔-米塔尔的 Bharti Telecom 酝酿创纪录的 17 亿美元债券交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度亿万富翁苏尼尔-米塔尔（Sunil Mittal）的巴蒂电信有限公司（Bharti Telecom Ltd.）正在考虑最早于下周发行约 1,500 亿卢比（17 亿美元）的债券。【原文：Indian billionaire Sunil Mittal’s Bharti Telecom Ltd. is considering to offer about 150 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) of bonds as early as next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度航空公司检查飞往英国航班的应急电源使用情况
item.description: 印度航空公司在周日的一份声明中说，上周末一架飞往英国的波音787梦想飞机在空中启动了紧急供电系统，印度航空公司因此停飞了这架飞机进行检查。【原文：Air India grounded a Boeing 787 Dreamliner for checks, after an emergency power system got activated midair in an UK-bound flight over the weekend, the airline said in a statement Sunday.】
